name: Weekly Inside-Bar Volume Breakout
description: Price-action strategy that trades liquid large-cap U.S. equities on weekly bars by exploiting inside-bar breakouts confirmed by a volume surge. It goes long when the weekly close breaks above the high of a preceding inside bar and that week’s volume ≥120 % of the 20-week average; shorts are taken on the reverse condition. Risk is capped with a 1.5× ATR(14) stop and 3× ATR(14) profit target. Position size is computed so that the dollar risk equals 1 % of account equity.
